title: Need help making ur stats stay on screen pls!!
body:
What im talking about is the little box next to ur champion pic when ur in game play. The box usually shows ur ad, ap, spd, atk spd, etc...
I know pressing the c button makes it appear only when u hold the c button, but how to make it stay permanently? Thank you in advance

replies.body: Clicking the Champion Info icon, which looks like a helmet next to your champion portrait, will toggle a permanent display of basic stats.  Holding C will also provide additional stats; however, there currently isn't a feature to permanently toggle that portion on.
